getInstance

public static RegistryServiceContext getInstance()
Returns an instance of the RegistryServiceContext. This instance is particular to each class loader.

Returns:
the instance of the RegistryServiceContext.

register

public <T,I extends T> void register(java.lang.Class<T> serviceClass,
                                     I implementation,
                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,? extends java.lang.Object> properties)
Description copied from interface: ServiceContext
Register a service in the context. Its a simples contract-implementation registration. Diferent implementations of the same contract can be distinguish by the use of properties. these properties can them be queried to find the correct implementations. A classic example is to print services, one that prints color and another that don't.

Specified by:
register in interface ServiceContext
Parameters:
serviceClass - the service contract interface type.
implementation - the contract implementation
properties - the properties related with this implementations.

unRegister

public void unRegister(java.lang.Class<?> serviceClass)
Unregister all implementations and options for the given service.

Specified by:
unRegister in interface ServiceContext
Parameters:
serviceClass - the service class to unregister.

Description copied from interface: ServiceContext
Unregisters a service from the context. The service will be macthed with the given properties ans contractInterface

Specified by:
unRegister in interface ServiceContext
Parameters:
serviceClass - the service contract interface type.
implementation - the contract implementation
properties - the properties related with this implementations.
